json_to_edit.voice_over: In the realm of dreams, Aria dared to defy gravity itself.
json_to_edit.description: Aria, guided by Zephyr and challenged by Granite, constructs a majestic floating city in the sky.
json_to_edit.weather: Calm with occasional wisps of cloud
json_to_edit.name: Skyward Dreams
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Aria builds a floating sky city with the help of Zephyr and despite Granite's doubts.

qa.action: A vast expanse of sky with floating islands of various sizes, setting the scene for Aria's ambitious project.

hf.action: Aria stands on a central floating platform, her hands outstretched as she begins to shape the city.

tr.action: Zephyr circles around Aria, guiding her movements as she manipulates the air and matter around her.

xc.action: Aria's eyes glow with intense concentration as she visualizes the city's intricate design.

ka.action: Granite observes from a nearby floating rock, his expression a mix of doubt and grudging admiration.

fn.action: Buildings and bridges begin to form in mid-air, pieces coming together like a giant 3D puzzle.

af.action: The completed floating city hovers majestically in the sky, a testament to Aria's vision and determination.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the realm of dreams, Aria dared to defy gravity itself.
updated_json.description: Aria, guided by Zephyr and challenged by Granite, constructs a majestic floating city in the sky.
updated_json.weather: Calm with occasional wisps of cloud
updated_json.name: Skyward Dreams

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots "tr", "ka", and "af" from the original seven shots. we'll update the "number_of_shots" to reflect this change, and adjust the "list_display_order" accordingly. all other information in the json will remain the same.
